DOC.brief_summary: Detect plasma Hsp90α concentration of breast cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign breast diseases patients
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Quantitative Detection Kit for Hsp90α in Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Detect plasma Hsp90α concentration of breast cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign breast diseases patients, validate accuracy, specificity and sensitivity of Hsp90α kit.
DOC.criteria: breast cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign breast diseases patients Patients who previously received radiotherapy
